Counter strike is a great game with simply and classic old cs graphics. This game got a bit too big hitboxes so its quiet easy to land nice shots. I like the classic movement that you can change direction mid-air and that you can bunnyhop (it's great to get nice clips ;). Anyways counter strike is a great game wich is very fun and not so compentive. I recommend this game if you like CS:GO and you dont want to be compentive but you want to make nice clips.
